thread.title: BRIEF-Zhuhai Orbita Aerospace Science & Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 50.1 pct to 80.1 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhuhai Orbita Aerospace Science & Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 50.1 pct to 80.1 pct

organizations.name: zhuhai orbita aerospace science & technology co ltd

text:
Jan 11(Reuters) - Zhuhai Orbita Aerospace Science & Technology Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 50.1 percent to 80.1 percent, or to be 127 million yuan to 152.3 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 84.6 million yuan
* Says inclusion of companies is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/cmPmXi
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
